ai-kv1.7:18.2_0: “That which is called the aggregates, there is no-one else.”
ai-kv1.7:18.5_0: “Mendicants, there are these three scopes of language, terminology, and descriptions. ...”
ai-kv1.7:18.9_0: “That which is called the aggregates, there is no-one else.”
ai-kv1.7:19.4_0: “Any kind of form at all—past, future, or present; internal or external; coarse or fine; inferior or superior; far or near: this is called the aggregate of form.
ai-kv1.7:19.5_0: Any kind of feeling at all ...
ai-kv1.7:19.7_0: Any kind of choices at all ...
ai-kv1.7:19.8_0: consciousness at all—past, future, or present;
ai-kv1.7:19.13_0: “That which is called the aggregates, there is no-one else.”
ai-kv1.7:19.14_0: The account of the past, future, and present is finished.
